about_the_game:
To access this guide you need to open an in-game menu by pressing the Esc key on your keyboard. The walkthrough button should be to the left side of the screen.

This guide is designed for players seeking assistance with their choices or aiming to unlock all available content in Race of Life Act 1.

Once downloaded, this DLC adds a new button in the About menu, which opens a separate PDF document when clicked.

Please note, this walkthrough contains significant spoilers, so it’s recommended to experience the game without it on your first playthrough.

The walkthrough has 162 pages.

What this walkthrough provides:

  • List of all characters and their description.

  • Detailed breakdown of each part of the story, explaining every choice and impact it currently makes.

  • Explains how mini-games work, including racing mini-game.

  • Gives you a full breakdown of how to win races.

  • Details on how to unlock all scenes in the gallery.

  • Guides you on unlocking all achievements.

  • Describes all the phone's features.

  • Explains how to win over each love interest currently available in the game.

  • Clarifies how all points in the game work.

content_descriptors.notes: This walkthrough contains descriptions of sexual scenes and mature content, which may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

This guide is designed for players seeking assistance with their choices or aiming to unlock all available content in Race of Life Act 1.

Once downloaded, this DLC adds a new button in the About menu, which opens a separate PDF document when clicked.

Please note, this walkthrough contains significant spoilers, so it’s recommended to experience the game without it on your first playthrough.

The walkthrough has 162 pages.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: This is the Race of Life Act 1 Walkthrough – a step-by-step guide through the story, explaining choices and how they impact the game.
